attributes.action: Increase number of NHS Dentists and shorten UNACCEPTABLE waiting times.
attributes.additional_details: Because there is a huge waiting list for the NHS Dentists, there is a lack of NHS Dentists due to funding cuts.People left weeks and months with no treatment, suffering extreme pain.
attributes.background: To investigate lack of NHS Dentists, the lack of funding available.  To shorten the waiting time. Some people are left in agony for weeks without any way of gaining treatment.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Increase funding to ensure all adults in England have access to an NHS dentist: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/576982

Independent review of the NHS dental contract: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564154
